subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN1575 has been delivered
description_text:

have a doubt, when will the haptic motors and the power supply come? Will I
be able to have any information about that shipment?

conversations.body_text: Hi Carlos Sergio,  Due to delays in the surface finishing of the VAM Pro housing, the first batch of orders is expected to begin shipping between June 16th and 18th. International express shipping will be used, ensuring fast delivery.
